content: in this legal case the tallinn district court made a decision after 8 years of ongoing proceedings the court resolved a dispute between two parties regarding the division of their joint property after their divorce the court annulled a previous decision and made a new one based on current laws the court divided the property and liabilities between the parties including loans and bank accounts the defendant appealed the decision and the district court agreed with some of their arguments and changed the decision of the county court the court ordered a new review of the case considering the termination of the marital relationship and the inclusion of funds in the defendants bank account as joint property the court also noted that the previous decision regarding compensation for the loss of the residence is no longer in dispute the parties reached a compromise agreement stating that the defendants must vacate the apartment and pay compensation to the plaintiff the disputed premises are located in tallinn and belong to the defendant the defendants agreed to vacate the apartment in exchange for compensation which was transferred to the plaintiffs bank account according to the law joint property acquired by spouses is considered the property of both spouses so the compensation should be divided equally between the parties the court made various determinations regarding the transfer the defendants bank accounts joint property and liabilities the court also considered the plaintiffs use of individual expenses for the benefit of the family or for a loan the court found that the loans were necessary for the plaintiffs daily expenses and that the defendant did not provide enough evidence to support their objections the court determined that the division of assets should be based on the value at the time of the loss of ownership in a civil case from 2015 the defendant made a claim against the plaintiff but the plaintiffs possible claim against the defendant expired the court determined the division of joint property including bank accounts and liabilities and the defendant must compensate the plaintiff the county courts decision regarding procedural costs was partially annulled and each party is responsible for their own costs the case is identified by a specific code and page number in the legal document
